attributes.action: demand that schools and education authorities be held accountable for the lack of support for children with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder. Stop the battle that parents face to get these organisations to recognise, support and encourage children with Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many parents, just like us, face a daily battle to try and get the support our children need in school. Constant battles with the school and the education authority still do nothing to stop these organisations treating our child as "just a naughty kid". How can the very people who should help these children, be the ones who ignore, bully and discriminate against them.
